@ grgagiga   Bah. Have you even been watching the same fight? It was a keylock, not an armbar!

Sadly, it seems grgagiga needs humor spoon-fed to him. Ok mental giant, try this on for size...might be a good fit:

GSP isnt part of Dynamite.
GSP wasnt fighting anywhere near Dec 31st.
Even children know this couldnt be true.

So what does one do in a situation where a foregone conclusion is being challenged in a way that seems far too ridiculous to be anything other then jest? 

Anyone?

Anyone?

Bueller?

Yes, the black midget in the back of the class had it correct....."you assume it to be comedy". Very good, black midget. You do us all proud with your insight. Pity about your height.

What have we learned here?

Anyone?

Anyone?
